name: habit-mapper-app
description: Simple application to map habits. Built with Ionic, Angular, NestJS, Postgres, Docker and AWS.
author: Dayman Novaes <daymannovaes@gmail.com>

scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd infrastructures && yarn install" "cd api && yarn install"  "cd user-interfaces && yarn install"
scripts.deploy:server: docker tag habit-mapper-api:latest 570876585042.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/habit-mapper-api:latest && docker push 570876585042.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/habit-mapper-api:latest && say "done" --voice Luciana
scripts.aws:update: aws ecs update-service --cluster habit-mapper-app-3 --service habit-mapper-ecs-service --force-new-deployment --profile daymannovaes
